creator: Yova AG
descriptionHtml:
This app gives existing Yova customers direct access to their impact investment. Download it for easy access to your investment performance, account information, impact news, and more.

Not an impact investor yet? Sign up at https://yova.ch and we will help you get started!

Living a sustainable life is tough, but we’re changing that. With Yova, you invest directly into companies that solve global challenges, while avoiding those not aligned with your values.

Why you’ll love the app:

- Explore your impact investing strategy
- View your balance, transactions & fees
- Track your performance over time
- Get notifications about your investment
- Adjust your monthly savings plan
- Catch the latest impact news
- Easily find your tax reports & documents
- Change your personal details and settings
- Earn rewards for referring your friends and growing the impact investing community

What Yova is all about:

We make sustainable investing easy – without compromising your returns. Just tell us what’s important to you, then lean back. We take care of the rest!

- Attractive returns
- Zero hidden fees
- Fully flexible – no lock-ins
- Invest in companies solving global problems

Created by experts in sustainability & finance. Powered by award-winning technology.
Join thousands of others who let their money grow, while it builds a more sustainable world!

What others say:
“If we take the Paris Climate Accord seriously, we need to make investments sustainable. Yova works on making this possible even with small investments.”
- Thomas Vellacott, CEO of WWF Switzerland

“Sustainable investing, as made possible by Yova, is an important lever to fight climate change.”
- Prof. Dr. Timo Busch, Research Group on Sustainable Finance at University of Hamburg

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We are excited to release the brand-new Yova Mobile App 1.0.0. The Yova mobile app gives you an easy way to check the performance of your investment; it provides an overview of your strategy; and it enables you to do profile changes and tell your friends about Yova. On top of that, we are proud to deliver you a new, exclusive feature: Impact Reporting. With it, you will see what concrete, positive impact your portfolio is having on our planet.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’ve all been waiting for it — the Yova App version 1.1.0 is finally making dreams come true: breaking Impact News for your companies directly broadcasted to you. No more random searches in newspapers, no more stalking your companies’ websites. The Yova team will now take care of this for you. On top of that, we listened to your feedback and developed several usability improvements. Evil bugs were met with kindness and shown the door. Warm wishes from the whole Yova team.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Warm greetings from the Yova engineers, we hope you’re well. In order to make your investment even more secure, we added two-factor authentication via text to your account. You can activate it in the ‘Profile’ section. We also fixed an issue with the biometric login. We hope you enjoy the improved Yova App, and stay safe!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Festive greetings from the Yova engineers, we hope you’re enjoying the season. In our latest version of the Yova mobile app, we have provided you with improved Fees & Reimbursement listings, featuring even more details. appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Greetings from the Yova engineers! The weather has been a downpour lately, so we’ve spent our time developing and improving new features for you. Now you can see your withdrawals and deposits in the performance chart and even request a withdrawal directly from the app. We’ve also implemented UX improvements such as full sign-out adjustments and updated handprint and footprint descriptions. We hope you enjoy the new updates – and possibly even the rain.

title: Inyova Impact Investing

creator: Inyova AG
descriptionHtml:
This app gives existing Inyova customers direct access to their impact investment. Download it for easy access to your investment performance, account information, impact news, and more.

Not an impact investor yet? Sign up at https://inyova.ch (Switzerland) or https://inyova.de (Germany) and we will help you get started!

Living a sustainable life is tough, but we’re changing that. With Inyova, you invest directly into companies that solve global challenges, while avoiding those not aligned with your values.

Why you’ll love the app:

- Explore your impact investing strategy
- View your balance, transactions & fees
- Track your performance over time
- Get notifications about your investment
- Adjust your monthly savings plan
- Catch the latest impact news
- Easily find your tax reports & documents
- Change your personal details and settings
- Earn rewards for referring your friends and growing the impact investing community

What Inyova is all about:

We make sustainable investing easy – without compromising your returns. Just tell us what’s important to you, then lean back. We take care of the rest!

- Sound financial returns
- Zero hidden fees
- Fully flexible – no lock-ins
- Invest in companies solving global problems

Created by experts in sustainability & finance. Powered by award-winning technology.
Join thousands of others who let their money grow, while it builds a more sustainable world!

What others say:
“If we take the Paris Climate Accord seriously, we need to make investments sustainable. Inyova works on making this possible even with small investments.”
- Thomas Vellacott, CEO of WWF Switzerland

“Sustainable investing, as made possible by Inyova, is an important lever to fight climate change.”
- Prof. Dr. Timo Busch, Research Group on Sustainable Finance at University of Hamburg
